languages.text: "Вы просите меня отдать предпочтение ренегатам и убийцам?" {n}Кассия хмурится, и вы ощущаете ее волнение словно свое.{/n} "С лояльными последователями самоубийственные экспедиции оканчиваются успехом в трех случаях из десяти, а с разрозненной командой — никогда".

traits.locale_text: "Вы просите меня отдать предпочтение ренегатам и убийцам?" {n}Кассия хмурится, и вы ощущаете ее волнение словно свое.{/n} "С лояльными последователями самоубийственные экспедиции оканчиваются успехом в трех случаях из десяти, а с разрозненной командой — никогда".
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: "You are asking me to cast my lot with renegades and murderers?" {n}Cassia frowns, and you can feel her unease as if it were your own.{/n} "Only three in ten suicidal expeditions meet with success, and only if the followers have undying loyalty to their leadership. Of those with divided crew, however, none survive."
languages.original_text: "Вы просите меня отдать предпочтение ренегатам и убийцам?" {n}Кассия хмурится, и вы ощущаете ее волнение словно свое.{/n} "С лояльными последователями самоубийственные экспедиции оканчиваются успехом в трех случаях из десяти, а с разрозненной командой — никогда".

Of those with divided crew, however, none survive."

Of those with divided crew, however, none survive."

Of those with divided crew, however, none survive."
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: 「あたくしの運命を反逆派と殺人者に委ねよと？」{n}カシアが顔をしかめると、あなたは自分のものかのようにカシアの不安を感じとる。{/n}「自殺に等しい遠征で生き残るのは10人に3人だけ、しかも同行者がリーダーに永遠の忠誠を誓ってこの数字です。しかしながら、乗務員と意見が分かれては誰も生き残れません」
languages.original_text: "You are asking me to cast my lot with renegades and murderers?" {n}Cassia frowns, and you can feel her unease as if it were your own.{/n} "Only three in ten suicidal expeditions meet with success, and only if the followers have undying loyalty to their leadership. Of those with divided crew, however, none survive."

traits.locale_text: 「あたくしの運命を反逆派と殺人者に委ねよと？」{n}カシアが顔をしかめると、あなたは自分のものかのようにカシアの不安を感じとる。{/n}「自殺に等しい遠征で生き残るのは10人に3人だけ、しかも同行者がリーダーに永遠の忠誠を誓ってこの数字です。しかしながら、乗務員と意見が分かれては誰も生き残れません」
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: “你是要我和那群叛徒、杀人犯一起前进吗？”{n}卡西娅皱起了眉头，她的不安直接涌上了你的心头。{/n}“像这种自杀式远征，成功率只有三成左右，而且前提是所有追随者都对领导人忠心耿耿。如果船员之间爆发冲突，所有人都必死无疑。”
languages.original_text: "You are asking me to cast my lot with renegades and murderers?" {n}Cassia frowns, and you can feel her unease as if it were your own.{/n} "Only three in ten suicidal expeditions meet with success, and only if the followers have undying loyalty to their leadership. Of those with divided crew, however, none survive."

traits.locale_text: “你是要我和那群叛徒、杀人犯一起前进吗？”{n}卡西娅皱起了眉头，她的不安直接涌上了你的心头。{/n}“像这种自杀式远征，成功率只有三成左右，而且前提是所有追随者都对领导人忠心耿耿。如果船员之间爆发冲突，所有人都必死无疑。”
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: « Vous me demandez de lier mon sort à celui de renégats et de meurtriers ? » {n}Cassia fronce les sourcils, et son malaise devient très vite le vôtre.{/n} « Seules trois expéditions suicides sur dix atteignent leur objectif, et seulement si l'équipage fait preuve d'une loyauté sans faille envers ses supérieurs. Dans le cas contraire, il n'y a jamais aucun survivant. »
languages.original_text: "You are asking me to cast my lot with renegades and murderers?" {n}Cassia frowns, and you can feel her unease as if it were your own.{/n} "Only three in ten suicidal expeditions meet with success, and only if the followers have undying loyalty to their leadership. Of those with divided crew, however, none survive."

traits.locale_text: « Vous me demandez de lier mon sort à celui de renégats et de meurtriers ? » {n}Cassia fronce les sourcils, et son malaise devient très vite le vôtre.{/n} « Seules trois expéditions suicides sur dix atteignent leur objectif, et seulement si l'équipage fait preuve d'une loyauté sans faille envers ses supérieurs. Dans le cas contraire, il n'y a jamais aucun survivant. »
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: «¿Me está pidiendo que me asocie con renegados y asesinos?». {n}Cassia frunce el ceño, y puedes notar su incomodidad como si fuese la tuya.{/n} «Solo tres de cada diez expediciones suicidas culminan con éxito, y únicamente si sus integrantes profesan una lealtad incondicional hacia su líder. Pero ninguna de las que están divididas sobrevive jamás».
languages.original_text: "You are asking me to cast my lot with renegades and murderers?" {n}Cassia frowns, and you can feel her unease as if it were your own.{/n} "Only three in ten suicidal expeditions meet with success, and only if the followers have undying loyalty to their leadership. Of those with divided crew, however, none survive."

traits.locale_text: «¿Me está pidiendo que me asocie con renegados y asesinos?». {n}Cassia frunce el ceño, y puedes notar su incomodidad como si fuese la tuya.{/n} «Solo tres de cada diez expediciones suicidas culminan con éxito, y únicamente si sus integrantes profesan una lealtad incondicional hacia su líder. Pero ninguna de las que están divididas sobrevive jamás».
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: "Ihr bittet mich, gemeinsame Sache mit Abtrünnigen und Mördern zu machen?" {n}Cassia runzelt die Stirn, und du spürst ihr Unbehagen, als wäre es dein eigenes.{/n} "Nur drei von zehn Selbstmordexpeditionen sind erfolgreich. Und das nur, wenn die Anhänger ihren Anführern gegenüber bedingungslos loyal sind. Wenn die Crew gespalten ist, überlebt niemand."
languages.original_text: "You are asking me to cast my lot with renegades and murderers?" {n}Cassia frowns, and you can feel her unease as if it were your own.{/n} "Only three in ten suicidal expeditions meet with success, and only if the followers have undying loyalty to their leadership. Of those with divided crew, however, none survive."

traits.locale_text: "Ihr bittet mich, gemeinsame Sache mit Abtrünnigen und Mördern zu machen?" {n}Cassia runzelt die Stirn, und du spürst ihr Unbehagen, als wäre es dein eigenes.{/n} "Nur drei von zehn Selbstmordexpeditionen sind erfolgreich. Und das nur, wenn die Anhänger ihren Anführern gegenüber bedingungslos loyal sind. Wenn die Crew gespalten ist, überlebt niemand."
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: "Hainler ve katillerle el birliği etmemi mi istiyorsun?" {n}Cassia somurtuyor. Hissettiği huzursuzluğu bizzat hissedebiliyorsun.{/n} "Bu kadar tehlikeli seyahatlerin yalnızca onda üçü başarılı oluyor, o da sadece takipçiler liderlerine sonuna kadar sadık kaldığında. Mürettebatı sadık olmayanlar asla başarılı olamıyor."
languages.original_text: "You are asking me to cast my lot with renegades and murderers?" {n}Cassia frowns, and you can feel her unease as if it were your own.{/n} "Only three in ten suicidal expeditions meet with success, and only if the followers have undying loyalty to their leadership. Of those with divided crew, however, none survive."

traits.locale_text: "Hainlerle katillere katılmamı mı istiyorsun?" {n}Cassia somurtuyor. Onun hissettiği huzursuzluğu kendi içinde de hissedebiliyorsun.{/n} "Bu kadar tehlikeli seyahatlerden sadece onda üçü başarılı oluyor; o da sadece takipçiler liderlerine sonuna kadar sadıksa. Mürettebatı sadık olmayanlar asla başarılı olamıyor."
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion
